### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #10443 (Add fee_est tool for debugging fee estimation code by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, p
The OP says "all call locale dependent functions", the title says "locale independence". Which is correct?\n\nWhat is the point of a test that tests the functions are not locale independent?

@MarcoFalke They all call functions that are known to be locale dependent (see list in [lint-locale-dependence.sh](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/test/lint/lint-locale-dependence.sh)) but they are supposed to do so in a way that guarantees that their own output is locale independent. Does that answer your question? :)

This has broken [Travis](https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/659308943):
